Headline: #151 Sheridan Temporary Reroute at Inner Lake Shore Drive/Division
ShortDescription: 151 Sheridan buses are temp. rerouted via LaSalle Dr, Outer Lake Shore Dr, and exit at Oak to Michigan at Inner Lake Shore Drive/Division.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via LaSalle Dr, Outer Lake Shore Dr, and exit at Oak to Michigan,  due to street blockage near Inner Lake Shore Drive/Division.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Normal Red Line Service Being Restored
ShortDescription: Some Red Line trains are running with residual delays after an earlier police activity delay at Cermak-Chinatown. Service is resuming.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Some Red Line trains are running with residual delays after an earlier police activity delay at Cermak-Chinatown.

Trains are now moving and service is resuming; allow extra travel time.
